Package fb.rt.math.matrix

This package contains function block types that perform operations on data of type MATRIX.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
M_ADD Performs MATRIX addition.
M_INV Performs MATRIX inversion.
M_MUL Upon the occurrence of an event at the REQ input, an instance of this function block type performs MATRIX multiplication of the IN1 and IN2 inputs.
M_SUB Upon the occurrence of an event at the REQ input, an instance of this function block type performs MATRIX subtraction of the IN1 and IN2 inputs.
 

Package fb.rt.math.matrix Description

This package contains function block types that perform operations on data of type MATRIX.
